snippet: On the Fluxus movement’s 50th anniversary, its leader, George Maciunas, is honored with an archival show.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews Anything Can Substitute Art: Maciunas in SoHo exhibit of work by artist George Maciunas at 41 Cooper Union Gallery.
lead_paragraph: On the Fluxus movement’s 50th anniversary, its leader, George Maciunas, is honored with an archival show.

headline.main: George Maciunas: ‘Anything Can Substitute Art: Maciunas in SoHo’
headline.print_headline: George Maciunas: ‘Anything Can Substitute Art: Maciunas in SoHo’
